title: Black-Scholes Call Option
notes: This equation prices European call options using the groundbreaking Black-Scholes model

title: Black-Scholes Put Option
notes: This equation prices European put options using put-call parity

title: Black-Scholes d1
notes: This parameter drives the Black-Scholes model

title: Black-Scholes d2
notes: This parameter completes the Black-Scholes framework

title: Put-Call Parity
notes: This fundamental relationship reveals the arbitrage constraints that must hold between calls and puts on the same underlying

title: Option Delta (Call)
notes: This equation measures the option's sensitivity to underlying price changes

title: Option Delta (Put)
notes: This equation shows put delta as negative

title: Option Gamma
notes: This equation measures the rate of change of delta

title: Option Theta (Call)
equation: \Theta_{C} = -\frac{S_{0} N'(d_{1}) \sigma}{2 \sqrt{T}} - r K e^{-rT} N(d_{2}) = -\frac{\partial C}{\partial T}
notes: This equation measures time decay

title: Option Vega
notes: This equation measures sensitivity to volatility changes

title: Option Rho (Call)
equation: \rho_{C} = K T e^{-rT} N(d_{2}) = \frac{\partial C}{\partial r}
notes: This equation measures sensitivity to interest rate changes

title: Binomial Tree Up Factor
notes: This equation defines the multiplicative upward movement in binomial option pricing

title: Binomial Tree Down Factor
notes: This equation defines the downward movement factor

title: Binomial Risk-Neutral Probability
notes: This equation calculates the risk-neutral probability of an up move

title: Binomial Option Price
notes: This equation implements backward induction in binomial trees

title: Trinomial Tree Probabilities
notes: This equation calculates probabilities in trinomial trees

title: Cox-Ross-Rubinstein Parameters
notes: \quad p = \frac{e^{r \Delta t} - d}{u - d}

title: Jarrow-Rudd Parameters
notes: \quad p = \frac{1}{2}

title: Implied Volatility Definition
notes: T

title: Volatility Smile
notes: This relationship reveals that implied volatility varies with strike price

title: Volatility Surface
notes: Options

title: SABR Model Volatility
notes: This equation provides the SABR model's implied volatility approximation

title: Digital Option Price
notes: This equation prices binary options that pay $1 if the condition is met

title: Barrier Option (Up-and-Out Call)
equation: C = S_{0} N(d_{1}) - K e^{-rT} N(d_{2}) - S_{0} \left(\frac{H}{S_{0}}\right)^{2\lambda} \left[ N(d_{1} - 2\lambda \sqrt{T}) - N(d_{2} - 2\lambda \sqrt{T}) \right]
notes: This complex equation prices barrier options that activate or deactivate based on price levels

title: Asian Option Price
notes: Options

title: Chooser Option
notes: This equation prices options that allow the holder to choose between call and put at a future date

title: Compound Option (Call on Call)
notes: This equation prices options on options
